hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT JOB_ID, EOOI_ORDER_ID, EOOI_ORDER_NO, EOOI_CODE, EOOI_NAME, EOOI_QUANTITY, EOOI_VOLUME, EOOI_GROSS_WEIGHT, EOOI_PRICE, EOOI_AMOUNT, EOOI_REMARK, EOOI_LINE_ID, EOOI_PACKAGE_TYPE_CODE, EOOI_PACKAGE_TYPE_NAME, EOOI_PACKAGE_UNIT_CODE, EOOI_PACKAGE_UNIT_NAME, EOOI_ITEM_TYPE_CODE, EOOI_ITEM_TYPE_NAME, EOOI_PACKAGE_QUANTITY, EOOI_NET_WEIGHT, EOOI_SOURCE_SUBINV_CODE, EOOI_TARGET_SUBINV_CODE, EOOI_BOX_PREFIX, EOOI_SOURCE_SYSTEM_CODE, EOOI_TRANS_CODE, EOOI_SOURCE_SALESMAN_ID, EOOI_TARGET_SALESMAN_ID, EOOI_BULK_FLAG, EOOI_COM_INSPECT_REMARKS, EOOI_ITEM_BARCODE, EOOI_CATEGORY_CODE, EOOI_UOM_CODE, EOOI_COMPONENT_CODE, EOOI_COMPONENT_NAME, EOOI_IS_SET_FLAG, EOOI_CONSIGNMENT_TYPE, EOOI_HEAD_ID, EOOI_UNTAX_PRICE, EOOI_PLAN_QUANTITY, EOOI_LOGISTIC_NO, EOOI_GROSS_WEIGHT_UNIT, EOOI_VOLUME_UNIT, EOOR_PRINT_PRICE, EOOI_PRODUCTION_DATE, EOOI_BLM, EOOI_IN_ITEM_STATUS, EOOI_IN_WEARHOUSE_AREA, EOOI_IN_WEARHOUSE_CODE, EOOI_OUT_ITEM_STATUS, EOOI_OUT_WEARHOUSE_AREA, EOOI_OUT_WEARHOUSE_CODE, EOOI_LOT_NO, EDI_TRANS_ID, EOOI_IN_WEARHOUSE_NAME, EOOI_ITEM_DESC, EOOI_IN_ITEM_STATUS_NAME, EOOI_UOM_NAME, EOOI_OUT_WEARHOUSE_NAME, EOOI_OUT_ITEM_STATUS_NAME, EOOI_LOT_ATT01, EOOI_LOT_ATT02, EOOI_LOT_ATT03, EOOI_LOT_ATT04, EOOI_LOT_ATT05, EOOI_LOT_ATT06, EOOI_LOT_ATT07, EOOI_LOT_ATT08, EOOI_LOT_ATT09, EOOI_LOT_ATT10, EOOI_PALLET_ID, EOOI_SO_ID_G, EOOI_REFERENCE_LINE_ID, EOOI_SALESMAN_NAME, EOOI_KIT_CODE, EOOI_ADJUSTMEN_TYPE, EOOI_KIT_NAME, EOOI_SOURCE_UOM_CODE FROM MID_EO_ORDER_B2B_ITEM WHERE 1=1 <<AND EOOI_ORDER_ID LIKE :eooiOrderId>> <<AND EOOI_ORDER_NO LIKE :eooiOrderNo>> <<AND EDI_TRANS_ID LIKE :ediTransId>>
